vehicles.name: Standard Car
vehicles.description: A balanced everyday vehicle with decent all-around performance.

vehicles.name: Sports Car
vehicles.description: High-speed sports car with excellent handling but low protection.

vehicles.name: Future Racer
vehicles.description: Futuristic racing car with top speed and handling, but minimal protection.

vehicles.name: Sports Hatchback
vehicles.description: Sporty hatchback balancing speed and practicality.

vehicles.name: Sedan
vehicles.description: Comfortable family sedan with moderate performance and good protection.

vehicles.name: SUV
vehicles.description: Sturdy SUV with excellent protection but slower speed and handling.

vehicles.name: Luxury SUV
vehicles.description: Premium SUV offering better performance than standard models with good protection.

vehicles.name: Pickup Truck
vehicles.description: Rugged pickup truck with excellent protection and off-road ability.

vehicles.name: Flatbed Truck
vehicles.description: Heavy-duty flatbed truck with maximum protection but slower movement.

vehicles.name: Van
vehicles.description: Practical van with good protection and moderate speed.

vehicles.name: Tractor
vehicles.description: Farm tractor with excellent durability but very slow speed.

vehicles.name: Shovel Tractor
vehicles.description: Heavy construction vehicle with maximum protection but minimal speed.

vehicles.name: Police Car
vehicles.description: Police pursuit vehicle with enhanced speed and handling.

vehicles.name: Police Tractor
vehicles.description: Specialized police tractor for rough terrain with good protection.

vehicles.name: Taxi
vehicles.description: City taxi with decent all-around performance.

vehicles.name: Delivery Van
vehicles.description: Delivery van balancing practicality and protection.

vehicles.name: Flatbed Delivery
vehicles.description: Flatbed delivery truck with good protection but slower speed.

vehicles.name: Ambulance
vehicles.description: Emergency ambulance with good acceleration and protection.

vehicles.name: Fire Truck
vehicles.description: Heavy fire truck with maximum protection but limited speed.

vehicles.name: Garbage Truck
vehicles.description: Durable garbage truck with maximum protection but very slow.

vehicles.name: Airplane
vehicles.description: Fast airplane with excellent handling and protection.
